title: LAP TIME detail page Â» CAR MODEL VARIANT
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to know with which CAR MODEL VARIANT a LAP TIME was achieved\
So I can compare it with other lap times of this car
description:
* The LAP TIME detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected CAR MODEL VARIANT.
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT is presented with its name and primary information.
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT contains a link to its detail page.
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no CAR MODEL VARIANT connected to the LAP TIME then the section is not displayed at all.
